sentence.Network_en: The enemies are unreconciled to their defeat.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The enemies are unreconciled to their defeat ., 敌人并不甘心失败.

list.abs: Dictionary Search Results ... 不甘 unreconciled to;not resigned to;unwilling 不干不净 unclean;filthy.

auth_sentence.content: Two competing versions of Chile's history exist, unreconciled.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two competing versions of Chile's history exist, unreconciled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two competing versions of Chile's history exist, unreconciled.

auth_sentence.content: Kandahar is officially Taliban-free, but it has an unreconciled atmosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kandahar is officially Taliban-free, but it has an unreconciled atmosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kandahar is officially Taliban-free, but it has an unreconciled atmosphere.

auth_sentence.content: But there was obviously a great hatred under the surface, a need to exorcise all those unreconciled demons on something physical.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there was obviously a great hatred under the surface, a need to exorcise all those unreconciled demons on something physical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there was obviously a great hatred under the surface, a need to exorcise all those unreconciled demons on something physical.
